Interface automationSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    admin, branchEmployee, customer

    public interface automationSystem

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addBranchEmployee

        void addBranchEmployee(int tBranch)
        Allows the admin to add a branch employee
        Parameters:
        tBranch - branch in which the employee will work
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the branch specified doesn't exist

      • removeBranchEmployee

        void removeBranchEmployee(int index)
        Allows the admin to remove a branch employee
        Parameters:
        index - index of the branch employee array, which employee will be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there isn't an employee of the specified index

      • addBranch

        void addBranch()
        Allows the admin to add a new branch, the branch number is assigned automatically

      • removeBranch

        void removeBranch(int num)
        Allows the admin to remove a branch
        Parameters:
        num - index of the branch array, which branch will be removed

      • anyProductNeeded

        void anyProductNeeded()
        Allows admin to see if there are any products needed by checking the need array
